title: Prenatal Consultation
description: Prepare for your breastfeeding journey before your baby arrives. We'll discuss your goals, answer your questions, and create a personalized plan for success.

title: In-Home Consultation
description: A comprehensive, hands-on consultation in the comfort of your own home. We'll address any concerns, work on latch and positioning, and develop a care plan.

title: Virtual Consultation
description: Get expert lactation support from anywhere. We'll connect via a secure video call to address your concerns and provide guidance.

title: Follow-Up Consultation
description: A shorter visit to check on progress, make adjustments to your care plan, and answer any new questions that have come up.

title: Insurance Information
description: Many insurance plans cover lactation services. I can provide you with a superbill to submit for reimbursement. Please check with your provider for details.
